sentences.en: An atheist never believes in God.
sentences.cn: 无神论者从来就不相信上帝.

sentences.en: Both the atheist and the religionist seem to be right.
sentences.cn: 无神论者和宗教人士似乎都是对的.

sentences.en: By the age of seventeen I was a full - fledged atheist.
sentences.cn: 到十七岁时,我已经完全成为一名无神论者.

sentences.en: He avowed himself ( to be ) an atheist.
sentences.cn: 他 供认 自己是无神论者.

sentences.en: He avowed himself (to be) an atheist.

sentences.cn: 他被公认是位无神论者.

sentences.en: He's a declared atheist.
sentences.cn: 他自称是无神论者.

sentences.en: I was an atheist at the time.
sentences.cn: 那个时候我是一个无神论者。

sentences.en: Interesting way of putting it. I'm atheist myself, but Isee no reason why this could not have happened that way. Kudos.
sentences.cn: 把它作为一种有趣的吐槽方式。我是无神论者，但我不明白为什么不可能发生这样的事。赞一个。

sentences.en: Leonard, a confirmed atheist, simply could not understand.
sentences.cn: 伦纳德这位坚定的无神论者实在是无法理解。

sentences.en: Mr. Dou, who described himself an atheist , sees things somewhat differently.
sentences.cn: 一直声称自己不信佛的窦理事对此事的看法则略有不同.

sentences.en: No, Bertha, if you're an atheist I can have nothing more to do with you.
sentences.cn: 不, 伯莎, 如果你是个无神论者,我不能再和你交往.

sentences.en: She was an atheist but now she says she's seen the light.
sentences.cn: 她本来是个无神论者,可是现在她说自己的信仰改变了.

sentences.en: So because you're an atheist, I don't get to celebrate the holidays?
sentences.cn: 所以,就因为你是个无神论者我就不能庆祝这些节日了?

sentences.en: So the assumption at that time of course, was that if you were an atheist there was nothing for you to make you moral.
sentences.cn: 当然了这在当时只是假设而已，如果你是一个无神论者,那么对你来说将没有任何道德上的教义。

sentences.en: The worst moment of the atheist is really be grateful, but can not find to grateful for that one.
sentences.cn: 无神论者最糟的时刻，就是真正心怀感恩之时，却找不到向其感恩的那一位。

sentences.en: There is no such thing as an atheist in a foxhole.
sentences.cn: 散兵坑里不存在无神论者.

sentences.en: To you I an atheist; to God, I'm the Loyal Opposition.
sentences.cn: 对你来说我是个无神论者, 对上帝来说, 我是个忠诚的反对者.

sentences.en: Vasari claimed with horror that he was, if not an atheist, then an agnostic.
sentences.cn: 瓦萨里惊恐地说他若非无神论者，就是不可知论者。

sentences.en: You know I regard myself as a practicing atheist?
sentences.cn: 你知道我一直把自己看作是现实的无神论者.
